page.title: 13FORESTRY COMMISSION_PEOPLE
page.content: In 1984 1000 acres were lost. If fires start the fire service is called in or the foresters use their own helicopter which carries water from the lake and tips it where the fire is worst. There are 30 workers in this forestry district but a maximum of 4 at Tair Onen. only 1 of the 30 is a woman. Forester Williams who showed us around, has worked for the forestry comission for 20 years & has to change forests every 10. His hours vary. He usually works from 7am to 10 pm and must therfore live nearby. There is a nature reserve. Foxes, squirrels & badgers are protected but rabbits are shot if they attack young trees. There is a lake with many different sorts of fish, wild ducks & moorhens. The lake has a weed problem so grass carp have been introduced to keep it clear.
